name: FitCheck
description: A fullstack MERN (Mongoose, Express, React, Node) application for users to upload pictures of and rate their daily workouts, to share with other users on the platform.

description: A React.js application built using the OpenBreweryDB API along with React Leaflet, to query a maintained database of breweries around the world and display their location on a map.

name: Simon (sus version)
description: A pattern-matching web browser game meant to re-create the reactor task from the popular online game "Among Us" using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

name: Biographical website
description: My own personal website showcasing my background and works as an artist and musician, recently refactored for mobile responsiveness.
